### Usage

#### Explore statistics of sequences in a FASTA file with the `stats` argument

First let's get a FASTQ file to play with
```{bash}
wget 
```


The `--all` flag give more statistics such as the quartiles of the sequence lengths and the N50
```{bash}
seqkit stats TARA_non_redundant_MAGs_AA.fa --all
```
